name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
method: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate skillet, cook chopped bacon until crispy.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for a minute.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain spaghetti and reserve 1/2 cup of the cooking water.
Add the hot spaghetti and reserved cooking water to the skillet with bacon and garlic, and toss to combine.
Remove from heat and stir in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing to coat the spaghetti evenly.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

name: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
method: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Season chicken breasts with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Dredge chicken in flour, shaking off excess.
Dip chicken in beaten eggs, then coat in breadcrumbs.
Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and spoon marinara sauce over each chicken breast.
Sprinkle with mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
Return to oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with chopped fresh basil leaves.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 ounces egg noodles, cooked according to package instructions
method: Season sliced beef with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Heat olive oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add beef to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides.
Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
Add chopped onion and sliced mushrooms to the skillet and sauté until tender.
Add minced garlic and sauté for a minute.
Sprinkle flour over vegetables and stir to combine.
